short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for Business Relationship Management app. Made for businesses where networking is critical. Employees control their data.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple Chrome extension to facilitate adding and editing contacts from Gmail, Outlook and LinkedIn to the UpHabit Personal CRM.
